summary: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.
cast: Rupert Graves|Helen Mirren|Amanda Donohoe|Charlotte Curley|Peter Bride-Kirk|Eve Camden|Thomas Copeland|Joanna Hall|Cassandra Halliburton|Russell Martin|Natalie Palys|Rupert Everett|Julian Rhind-Tutt|David Leon|Martin Julier|Nigel Hawthorne|Anthony Calf|Matthew Lloyd Davies|Adrian Scarborough|Paul Corrigan|John Wood|Dan Hammond|Nicholas Irons|Nick Sampson|Jeremy Child|Nicholas Selby|Julian Wadham|Jim Carter|Barry Stanton|Struan Rodger|Janine Duvitski|Caroline Harker|Iain Mitchell|Roger Hammond|Geoffrey Palmer|Celestine Randall|Cyril Shaps|Michael Grandage|Ian Holm|James Peck|Clive Brunt|Selina Cadell|Fergus Webster|Barry Gillespie|Joe Maddison|Dermot Keaney|Peter Woodthorpe|Colin McPhillamy|Roger Ashton-Griffiths|Robert Swann|Alan Bennett|Ryan Hurst|Christian Jull|Guy Standeven
title: La locura del rey Jorge
